RED - Static variable in class view.TUI.TUIutils
This is the ANSI codes for red
refillAlgorithm(Tile[][]) - Method in class model.StandardLivingRoom
this method is responsible for calling the methods needed to fill the board, namely StandardLivingRoom.fillCenterSquare(Tile[][]) that fills the center part of the board, always called StandardLivingRoom.fillSideSquares(Tile[][], int, int) (Tile[][])} that fills the squares around the center, always called StandardLivingRoom.fillMissingCells(Tile[][]) (Tile[][])} that fills the missing cells needed for the 2 player board, always called StandardLivingRoom.fillMissingCells3Players(Tile[][]) (Tile[][])} (Tile[][])} that fills the missing cells needed for the 3 player board, called if 3 players are in the game StandardLivingRoom.fillMissingCells4Players(Tile[][]) (Tile[][])} (Tile[][])} that fills the missing cells needed for the 4 player board, called if 4 players are in the game
refillBoard() - Method in class model.abstractModel.LivingRoom
This method modifies the current representation of living room board on the base of subclass implementation defined pattern
refillBoard() - Method in class model.StandardLivingRoom
refillBoard() is called before every turn if StandardLivingRoom.needsToBeRefilled() is true this method acquires a copy of the game board, uses the method StandardLivingRoom.refillAlgorithm(Tile[][]) to refill it and sets the board with this filled copy
